named-query.name: User.findUserTree
named-query.query: select user from User user join FETCH user.deviceType deviceType join FETCH user.userGroup userGroup join FETCH userGroup.chart chart join FETCH userGroup.news news join FETCH userGroup.drmPolicy drmPolicy join FETCH drmPolicy.drmType drmType join FETCH userGroup.community community join FETCH community.appVersion appVersion join FETCH user.status status where user.id=?
